contentrichtext.text: '''Layton''' may refer to: ==Places== * [[Layton, Lancashire]], a district of the town of Blackpool, England * [[Layton, Florida]], USA * [[Layton, New Jersey]], USA * [[Layton, Utah]], USA ** [[Layton (UTA station)|Layton]], Utah Transit Authority commuter rail station * [[Laytonville, California]], USA ==Other uses== * [[Layton (surname)]] * [[Baron Layton]] * ''[[Professor Layton]]'', a series of Nintendo DS and Nintendo 3DS video games ** [[Professor Hershel Layton]], for whom the series is named == See also == * [[Leighton (disambiguation)]] (may be pronounced 'lay-ton' or 'lie-ton') * [[Leyton]] * [[Lawton (disambiguation)]] {{disambiguation|geo}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Layton}} [[Category:English toponyms]]
